name: Block Miner (Rhm81)
description:
This is a simple game where you mine blocks and a lot more. I'm also going to actively update the game as much as I can. Leave some suggestions on the comments on what to add. My YouTube channel link - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0VJ7Tq39k-87abzshL8guA.

There is a bug idk why its there and its like you have 8000+ MBs at the start of the game go to settings>reset game if you want a pure experience
